Hi All,

I just discovered this competition from a post to the GP list (apologies 
if you're on that list):

http://algoval.essex.ac.uk:8080/othello/html/Othello.html

It's extremely relevant to the discussions we've been having on TTT and 
board game playing in general. Personally I find these types of 
competition to be very motivational, I quite enjoyed attempting the 
Physical Travelling Salesperson Problem earlier in the year for instance 
(run by the same person).

Colin
